00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_USER_FUNCTIONS_CALLER_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_USER_FUNCTIONS_CALLER_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "parameter.hpp"
00025 #include "parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00026 #include "argument_caster.hpp"
00027 
00028 #include <boost/assign.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include <iostream>
00031 
00034 namespace clpp {
00035 
00038 namespace detail {
00039 
00040 using namespace boost::assign;
00041 
00048 class user_functions_caller {
00049 public:
00050     user_functions_caller( const parameters&                    _registered_parameters
00051                            , const parameter_parts_extractor&   _extractor
00052                            , const std::string&                 _name_value_separator ) :
00053             registered_parameters( _registered_parameters )
00054             , extractor( _extractor )
00055             , name_value_separator( _name_value_separator ) {}
00056 private:
00057     const parameters&                registered_parameters;
00058     const parameter_parts_extractor& extractor;
00059     const std::string&               name_value_separator;
00060     argument_caster                  caster;
00061 public:
00062     void call( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00063         str_storage all_names = collect_names_of_all_registered_parameters();
00064         call_functions_for_parameters_without_values( inputed_parameters, all_names );
00065         call_functions_for_parameters_with_inputed_values( inputed_parameters, all_names );
00066         call_functions_for_parameters_with_default_values( all_names ); 
00067     }
00068 private:
00069     str_storage collect_names_of_all_registered_parameters() const {
00070         str_storage all_names;
00071         BOOST_FOREACH ( const parameter& registered_parameter, registered_parameters ) {
00072             all_names += registered_parameter.short_name;
00073         }
00074         return all_names;
00075     } 
00076 private: 
00077     void call_functions_for_parameters_without_values( const str_storage&  inputed_parameters
00078                                                        , str_storage&      all_names ) const {
00079         BOOST_FOREACH ( const std::string& inputed_parameter, inputed_parameters ) {
00080             if ( this_is_parameter_without_value( inputed_parameter ) ) {
00081                 const std::string name = inputed_parameter;
00082                 parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00083                                                    , registered_parameters.end()
00084                                                    , name );
00085                 if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00086                     if ( !it->func_without_arg.empty() ) {
00087                         it->func_without_arg();
00088                     } else {}
00089                     delete_element( all_names, it->short_name );
00090                 } else {}
00091             }
00092         }
00093     }
00094 
00095     void call_functions_for_parameters_with_inputed_values( const str_storage&  inputed_parameters
00096                                                             , str_storage&      all_names ) const {
00097         BOOST_FOREACH ( const std::string& inputed_parameter, inputed_parameters ) {
00098             if ( this_is_parameter_with_value( inputed_parameter ) ) {
00099                 const std::string name  = extractor.extract_name_from( inputed_parameter );
00100                 parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00101                                                    , registered_parameters.end()
00102                                                    , name );
00103                 if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00104                     if ( !it->func_without_arg.empty() ) {
00105                         it->func_without_arg();
00106                     } else {
00107                         const std::string value = extractor.extract_value_from( inputed_parameter );
00108                         call_func_with_arg( *it, value );
00109                     }
00110                     delete_element( all_names, it->short_name );
00111                 } else {}
00112             }
00113         }
00114     }
00115     
00116     bool this_is_parameter_with_value( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00117         return boost::contains( inputed_parameter, name_value_separator );
00118     }
00119 
00120     bool this_is_parameter_without_value( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00121         return !boost::contains( inputed_parameter, name_value_separator );
00122     }
00123     
00124     void call_func_with_arg( const parameter& registered_parameter
00125                              , const std::string& inputed_value ) const {
00126         const any& for_arg = registered_parameter.for_arg;
00127         const std::string name = registered_parameter.short_name;
00128         caster.call_func_with_inputed_arg( for_arg, name, inputed_value ); 
00129     }
00130 private:
00131     void call_functions_for_parameters_with_default_values( const str_storage& all_names ) const {
00132         BOOST_FOREACH ( const parameter& registered_parameter, registered_parameters ) {
00133             str_const_it it = std::find( all_names.begin()
00134                                          , all_names.end()
00135                                          , registered_parameter.short_name );
00136             if ( all_names.end() != it ) {
00137                 call_func_with_default_arg( registered_parameter ); 
00138             } else {}
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     void call_func_with_default_arg( const parameter& registered_parameter ) const {
00143         if ( registered_parameter.has_default_value() && registered_parameter.func_without_arg.empty() ) {
00144             const any& for_arg = registered_parameter.for_arg;
00145             caster.call_func_with_default_arg( for_arg ); 
00146         } else {}
00147     }
00148 };
00149 
00150 } // namespace detail
00151 } // namespace clpp
00152 
00153 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_USER_FUNCTIONS_CALLER_HPP
